description: A rapid punching technique utilizing all six of Hatchan's octopus arms to strike opponents repeatedly.

firstUse.context: Hatchan uses this technique underwater against Sanji while pursuing him during Luffy's rescue.

strengths: Multiple simultaneous strikes from different angles
Particularly effective underwater where fish-men have advantage

description: Arlong propels himself at his opponent at tremendous speed like a torpedo, using his saw-like nose to impale enemies. The technique combines fish-man swimming ability with Arlong's shark physiology.

firstUse.context: Arlong uses this devastating attack to pierce Zoro during their battle, demonstrating the deadly effectiveness of his saw-nose.

strengths: Extremely high speed and impact force
Difficult to dodge due to velocity
Arlong's saw-nose can pierce through most defenses
Can be used both in water and on land
weaknesses: Linear attack path makes it somewhat predictable
